about_the_game:
Life’s always better with a dog by your side and now you can be Man’s Best Friend with the brand-new Friends in the Darkness DLC for Sker Ritual!

A legacy all of its own filled with tails of faithfulness and devotion, Calliope and Lucky never strayed from Sker Island.



Friends in the Darkness DLC unlocks 2 new masks and exclusive items, including Calliope coming back with a new four-legged friend Lucky and they’re here to stay!

The Friends in the Darkness DLC unlocks 2 new masks. Will you bring the luck with Lucky or show your loyalty with Calliope? Your enemies and friends will always be happy to see you with the Dog Player Emblem. You can even treat them to an in-game bark!



This pack includes 5 new items:

Lucky

An Exclusive Premium Mask of the bestest boy to bring you Luck

Calliope

An Exclusive Premium Mask of the bestest girl we just couldn’t forget

Sker Hotel Courtyard

Premium Animated Menu Background in the serenely spooky Sker Hotel Courtyard

Dog Bark

An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line, is your bark worse than your bite?

Dog Emblem


An Exclusive Dog Emblem Player Icon to show everyone who’s the bestest friend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Become man's best friend with this content pack featuring two premium furry masks of Lucky and Calliope, alongside a Premium menu background and more!
